titles: A discourse concerning the church ... by the Right Reverend Father in God, Robert Sanderson ...
author: Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.
publisher: Printed by T.B. for R. Taylor,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

(from t.p.) I. concerning the visibility of the true church -- II. concerning the Church of Rome -- III. concerning Protestant churches -- IV. an answer to this question, Where was your church before Luther?
